channel.title: Bz on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Bz on TLDRBins

item.title: Compressed Files
item.description: Hint: Always put the zip file inside a new folder before unzip zip tar.gz tar gz rar 7z bz # zip a file zip <FILE>.zip <FILE> # zip a folder zip -r <FOLDER>.zip <FOLDER>/ # zip a symlink (not the destination file) zip --symlinks file.zip <SYMLINK> # List files without unzip unzip -l <FILE> # unzip unzip <FILE> # unzip (Windows) Add-Type -AssemblyName System.IO.Compression.FileSystem; [System.IO.Compression.ZipFile]::ExtractToDirectory('<FILE_PATH>', 'C:\ProgramData\') # Compress a file tar -cvzf <FILE>.
